posts.post_content:
I'm always up for some trade chat, so even if you don't have anything on my high-priority list, please reach out (DMs/email works best)! I'll will also include a link to my Google drive featuring all my trade fodder, which has mostly baseball, vintage to some modern (please let me know if the link isn't working).

My "high-priority" list would include: Bob Gibson RC, 1955 Topps Ted Williams, Carl Yastrzemski, and I have a few of the 1959 Fleer Ted Williams left to finish the set. I do very limited modern, but would be interested in the 2013 Topps Boston Strong cards.

T205 Trade Fodder
Ed Karger - Piedmont: SGC 2.5
John Kleinow - Hassan: SGC 2
Charles Wagner - Cycle: SGC 1.5

Here's a link to my folder: [url]https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1S3TMsXjuV6GI7qpL3FfdxMsYYaw1_KTQ?usp=drive_link[/url]

Hi Garth,
sent you a PM here.
Ben
Bump - updated availability. Still looking to trade!
Bump! Three left, Karger, Kleinow and Wagner - let's trade!
